Question & Options:
What can be inferred about Krish's knowledge regarding the deaths in the jungle?
Options:
A. Krish recognized that the deaths were not caused by wild animals.
B. Krish reported the deaths as tiger attacks despite knowing the real cause.
C. Bagga was involved in the investigation of the deaths.
D. Krish decided to keep the real cause of the deaths a secret.
Correct Answer: a) Krish recognized that the deaths were not caused by wild animals. b) Krish reported the deaths as tiger attacks despite knowing the real cause. d) Krish decided to keep the real cause of the deaths a secret.

Question & Options:

B. Krish identifies tiger attacks as a cause.
C. Krish believes that Pandey's death was not caused by a tiger.
D. Both Bagga and Krish are concerned about the recent deaths.
Correct Answer: Both Bagga and Krish are concerned about the recent deaths.
